pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:7.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:9.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:10.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti, na sakkoti padasā gantuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:10.4: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:11.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:15.2: vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:17.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:17.2: Agilānā vematikā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:17.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
